titleStmt.title: The countryman vvith his houshold Being a familiar conference, concerning faith towards God, and good workes before men; fitted for the capacitie of the meanest. By R.S. preacher of the word at Arley. See the contents more particularly before the booke.
titleStmt.author: Sherrard, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Edward Griffin for Ionah Man at the Talbot in Pater-noster Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
